post.author: Displaced
post.body:
Stop waiting for the 2.5 upgrade; it's not coming... Hooray! Keep a fresh pair of pants ready and head on over to pixologic:

http://www.pixologic.com/zbrush/3/overview.php

Sweet!

post.author: iceheart
post.body: Impressive videos, but if I know pixologic, everything will be nonsensical and extremely unintuitive. There's just no fixing that UI without starting from scratch and observing basic UI guidelines that every other application has followed for 10+ years.

post.author: Regulator
post.body: Yeah I hate zbrush gui too, hopefully they will fix it in this version.

post.author: Dinky
post.body: Wehhh?? I have no problem with the UI, I work pretty fast with it. What're you a 3dsmax user?? That's the UI I hate ^_^.
